verse.name: c1a
c1b
verse.lines:
Leave your sins for the blood to cover,
There’s Honey in the Rock for you.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
O my brother,
do you know the Savior,
Who is wondrous kind
and true?

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
He’s the “Rock of your salvation!”
There’s Honey in the Rock for you.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Have you “tasted that the Lord is gracious?”
Do you walk in the way
that’s new?

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Have you drunk
from the living fountain?
There’s Honey in the Rock for you.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Do you pray unto God
the Father,
“What wilt Thou have me
to do?”

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Never fear,
He will surely answer,
There’s Honey in the Rock for you.

verse.name: v4a
v4b
verse.lines:
Say to every
fallen brother,
There’s Honey in the Rock for you.
